mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, a.class_id, a.ann_title, a.ann_seq, a.ann_regi, c.class AS class_name, a.lib_id, l.lib_name FROM announcement a LEFT OUTER JOIN ann_class c ON a.class_id = c.class_id LEFT OUTER JOIN library l ON a.lib_id = l.lib_id ORDER BY ANN_SEQ DESC ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 3

SELECT sum(book_loan_seq) as book_loan_seq, lib_id, lib_name, sum(book_return_seq) as book_return_seq, sum(book_res_seq) as book_res_seq FROM li_book JOIN library USING(lib_id) GROUP BY lib_id, lib_name
